thread.title: PEER report: Mississippi school districts’ administration expenses increase over instructional
thread.title_full: PEER report: Mississippi school districts’ administration expenses increase over instructional

author: Frank Corder
title: PEER report: Mississippi school districts’ administration expenses increase over instructional
text: PEER report: Mississippi school districts’ administration expenses increase over instructional Initiative 42 proponents won't want to see these stats PEER report finds that Mississippi public school districts "administration" expenses have increased more than "instructional" from Fiscal Year 2005-2014.
